summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1311, for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to East Union Street, by constructing therein water mains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 14785, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
